short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Multi-chain Gasless Smart Wallet for gasless transaction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a beta version of WalletX for anyone who wants to test the latest version before it is released officially.

Warning: Please don't use this as a primary wallet and also don't add mainnet funds here.
